Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Total time between SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion and SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Checklist Completed after the execution of SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Total waiting time to the SW-Checklist Completed following SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Time from SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to Manuscript Export Succeeded in variants that include Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion and SW-Awaiting AE Assignment across all process variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to be followed by any checklist-related reminder activity (e.g., SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days'

Name: Total time from SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to SW-EIC Reject in variants ending with rejection
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Minimum time between SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion and SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in complex review paths involving multiple reviewer assignments
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Time of SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion relative to the start of the case in submissions that later undergo major revision cycles
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and the end of case where activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision occurs

Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in cases where SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs at least once
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Total resolution time of SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion in cases that eventually reach SW-EIC Accept
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion and the first occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed in the same case
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average time between SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion and SW-Reviewer Agreed, compared to the time between SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion and SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
